Frequently asked questions

How long is a session?

Each session lasts 50 minutes. This duration allows for in-depth work while maintaining focus.

Do you offer online sessions or only in-person?

I offer both modalities. Online sessions are conducted via secure video call, while in-person sessions take place at my practice.

Do I need a referral?

No, you don't need a referral to book a private psychotherapy session.

How can I cancel or reschedule an appointment?

You can modify or cancel your appointment directly from the confirmation link you receive via email, or by contacting me at giovannaniola@gmail.com. I ask that you give at least 24 hours' notice when possible.

How long does it take to receive a response?

I typically respond within 48 business hours. If you need urgent assistance, I recommend contacting appropriate emergency services.

How long does a therapy course last?

Duration varies depending on individual goals. CBT is generally a short-to-medium term approach, but each course is tailored to specific needs.

Do you work with adolescents?

[Placeholder: Specify your target age range and whether you work with minors, and if so, whether parental presence is required]

Can't find the answer you're looking for? Feel free to contact me via email at giovannaniola@gmail.com.
